AssociateLicense.name: AssociateLicense
AssociateLicense.description: Grants permission to upgrade a workspace with a license

CreateWorkspace.name: CreateWorkspace
CreateWorkspace.description: Grants permission to create a workspace

CreateWorkspaceApiKey.name: CreateWorkspaceApiKey
CreateWorkspaceApiKey.description: Grants permission to create API keys for a workspace

CreateWorkspaceServiceAccount.name: CreateWorkspaceServiceAccount
CreateWorkspaceServiceAccount.description: Grants permission to create service accounts for a workspace

CreateWorkspaceServiceAccountToken.name: CreateWorkspaceServiceAccountToken
CreateWorkspaceServiceAccountToken.description: Grants permission to create service account tokens for a workspace

DeleteWorkspace.name: DeleteWorkspace
DeleteWorkspace.description: Grants permission to delete a workspace

DeleteWorkspaceApiKey.name: DeleteWorkspaceApiKey
DeleteWorkspaceApiKey.description: Grants permission to delete API keys from a workspace

DeleteWorkspaceServiceAccount.name: DeleteWorkspaceServiceAccount
DeleteWorkspaceServiceAccount.description: Grants permission to delete service accounts for a workspace

DeleteWorkspaceServiceAccountToken.name: DeleteWorkspaceServiceAccountToken
DeleteWorkspaceServiceAccountToken.description: Grants permission to delete service account tokens for a workspace

DescribeWorkspace.name: DescribeWorkspace
DescribeWorkspace.description: Grants permission to describe a workspace

DescribeWorkspaceAuthentication.name: DescribeWorkspaceAuthentication
DescribeWorkspaceAuthentication.description: Grants permission to describe authentication providers on a workspace

DescribeWorkspaceConfiguration.name: DescribeWorkspaceConfiguration
DescribeWorkspaceConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the current configuration string for the given workspace

DisassociateLicense.name: DisassociateLicense
DisassociateLicense.description: Grants permission to remove a license from a workspace

ListPermissions.name: ListPermissions
ListPermissions.description: Grants permission to list the permissions on a wokspace

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags associated with a workspace

ListVersions.name: ListVersions
ListVersions.description: Grants permission to list all available supported Grafana versions. Optionally, include a workspace to list the versions to which it can be upgraded

ListWorkspaceServiceAccountTokens.name: ListWorkspaceServiceAccountTokens
ListWorkspaceServiceAccountTokens.description: Grants permission to list service account tokens for a workspace

ListWorkspaceServiceAccounts.name: ListWorkspaceServiceAccounts
ListWorkspaceServiceAccounts.description: Grants permission to list service accounts for a workspace

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to, or update tag values of, a workspace

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a workspace

UpdatePermissions.name: UpdatePermissions
UpdatePermissions.description: Grants permission to modify the permissions on a workspace

UpdateWorkspace.name: UpdateWorkspace
UpdateWorkspace.description: Grants permission to modify a workspace

UpdateWorkspaceAuthentication.name: UpdateWorkspaceAuthentication
UpdateWorkspaceAuthentication.description: Grants permission to modify authentication providers on a workspace

UpdateWorkspaceConfiguration.name: UpdateWorkspaceConfiguration
UpdateWorkspaceConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the configuration string for the given workspace
